name: Eye of Perception
desc: A dim black glaze pearl that is said to have the power to reach the purity of one's heart.
skill_desc: Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to fire a Bolt of Perception, dealing 240%/270%/300%/330%/360% ATK as DMG. This bolt can bounce between opponents a maximum of 4 times. This effect can occur once every 12/11/10/9/8s.
